trip_details.destination: Rajasthan 1 Night Jaisalmer City – 1 Night Jaisalmer Sam
trip_details.validity: Oct To March (Except Black Out Dates & Long Weekend)

standard.hotel: Bhagwati Villas / Chandra Inn or Similar

deluxe.hotel: Apex International / Chandra Imperial or Similar
Khamma Ghanni Desert Camp or Similar

super_deluxe.hotel: Mapple Abhay / Amritara Manak Haveli or Similar
Sia Desert Camp / Desert Gateway Resort or Similar

daywise_itinerary.summary: Arrival at Jaisalmer & explore local sightseeing including Fort, Havelis and Gadisar Lake.
detailed: Pick up from Jaisalmer Airport / Railway Station.
Drive directly to Sam Sand Dunes for a unique desert experience.
Check-in at your luxury desert camp.
Enjoy Camel Safari on the golden dunes during sunset.
Experience traditional Rajasthan cultural night with folk dance, music & bonfire.
Tea/coffee with snacks during the cultural show.
Enjoy a delicious Rajasthani buffet dinner at the camp.
Overnight stay at Sam Desert Camp.

daywise_itinerary.summary: Jaisalmer local sightseeing and later transfer to Sam for camel safari & desert camp experience.
detailed: After breakfast, depart from Sam and drive toward Jaisalmer city.
Visit major attractions: Jaisalmer Fort (Sonar Quila), Patwon Ki Haveli, Nathmal Ki Haveli, Gadisar Lake.
Free time in local markets for shopping.

daywise_itinerary.summary: Departure from Jaisalmer with wonderful memories.
detailed: After breakfast, enjoy Jodhpur’s key attractions: Mehrangarh Fort, Jaswant Thada, Umaid Bhawan Palace (museum), Clock Tower Market.
After sightseeing, drop at Jodhpur Airport / Railway Station for your onward journey.
